headline: A Look At McKesson (MCK) Valuation As Shares Deliver Strong 1-Year Returns
summary: McKesson stock snapshot and recent performance McKesson (MCK) has drawn investor attention recently as its share price sits at $826.51, with mixed short term returns and gains reported over the past 3 months and year. See our latest analysis for McKesson. Recent trading has been relatively calm, but a 90 day share price return of 9.36% alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of 41.82% suggests that momentum has been building rather than fading.
